channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 09/09/2023 INC#0179

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0179; 04:13AM; 2311 W Fargo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3P9VzBi; #SilverLake; Firefighters encountered heavy fire and excessive storage conditions inside the two-story hillside home. As the incident progressed, crews observed structural weakening and were forced to retreat into defensive mode. Once outside, the structure sustained a partial roof collapse. It took 90 firefighters 35 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E20 E203 E211 E220 E227 E235 E250 E27 E35 E55 E56 E6 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA20 RA3 RA56 RA6 RA803 SO1 T11 T20 T27 T3 T35 T50 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12 13 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0097; 02:27AM; 876 S Norton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B52VQd; #Koreatown; It took 73 firefighters 37 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames, operating in mostly defensive mode for the duration of the incident (site of previous fires). No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 5; BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E211 E226 E227 E229 E26 E261 E27 E29 E61 EM11 HR3 RA27 RA29 RA829 T11 T26 T27 T29 T61 UR27 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0179; 03:28AM; 2311 W Fargo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3P9VzBi; #SilverLake; Single-family home with heavy fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E20 E220 E235 E250 E35 E56 E6 EM11 RA20 RA56 T20 T35 T50; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0097; 01:50AM; 876 S Norton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3B52VQd; #Koreatown; Two-story home with heavy fire showing. Defensive mode. ; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 5; BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E211 E226 E227 E229 E26 E261 E27 E29 E61 EM11 HR3 RA27 RA29 RA829 T11 T26 T27 T29 T61 UR27 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1683; 09:43PM; 4020 N Mandeville Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EyHSXC; #Brentwood; After establishing an anchor point (a point where the fire cannot retreat beyond), crews surrounded the fire with hose lines in steep terrain, while fire helicopters made water drops on the head of the fire. It took 36 firefighters 61 minutes to extinguish the flames in medium-to-heavy brush. No structures were threatened. ; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC17 BC9 E109 E19 E23 E237 E269 E290 E292 E69 E71 E90 EM9 H1 H2 H4 H7 HA1 HA2 HA4 HA7 T37 T69 T90 T92; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1683; 08:42PM; 4020 N Mandeville Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EyHSXC; #Brentwood; Approximately a half-acre of brush burning, with a slow rate-of-spread. Crews are responding by ground and air.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC17 BC9 E109 E19 E23 E237 E269 E290 E292 E69 E71 E90 EM9 H1 H2 H4 H7 HA1 HA2 HA4 HA7 T37 T69 T90 T92; CH5; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1075; 03:12PM; 833 S Fedora St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sH87Zf; #Koreatown; Firefighters found fire in the elevator room and elevator shaft, which caused smoke to spread inside the building. Firefighters on the roof cut holes to allow smoke and heated gases to escape, while crews were proactively evacuating residents. Thankfully the 50 firefighters on scene extinguished the flames in 25 minutes, and cleared the smoke from the building, allowing all residents to repopulate their residences. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E13 E15 E211 E215 E226 E229 E29 E6 RA15 RA813 SQ21 T11 T15 T26 T29; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1075; 02:47PM; 833 S Fedora St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sH87Zf; #Koreatown; Four-story apartment building with smoke showing from the roof (attic?). Offensive mode.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E13 E15 E211 E215 E226 E229 E29 E6 RA15 RA813 SQ21 T11 T15 T26 T29; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0683; 11:24AM; 2249 S Harvard Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/463xXoC; #AdamsNormandie; Firefighters made access to the three-story home, and ascended interior stairwells with hose lines. Fire attack crews located fire on the 3rd floor and in the attic, as ventilation crews went to the roof to cut holes for smoke and super-heated gases to escape. Ultimately, it took 47 firefighters 27 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 8; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E15 E215 E226 E26 E34 E447 EA1 EM11 RA11 RA834 SQ21 T15 T26 T29; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0683; 10:57AM; 2249 S Harvard Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/463xXoC; #AdamsNormandie; Three-story craftsman home with light light smoke showing. Crews located a fire on the 3rd floor. Offensive mode.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 8; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E15 E215 E226 E26 E34 E447 EM11 RA11 RA834 SQ21 T15 T26 T29; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange
